#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define f 1/1000000
int main()
{
	int S,T,x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3;
	double d1,d2,d3,d;
	cin>>S;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2>>x3>>y3;
		d1=((y2-y1)*(y2-y1)+(x2-x1)*(x2-x1));
		d2=((y3-y2)*(y3-y2)+(x3-x2)*(x3-x2));
		d3=((y1-y3)*(y1-y3)+(x1-x3)*(x1-x3));
		//cout<<d1<<" "<<d2<<" "<<d3<<endl;
		if(d1==d2 || d2==d3 ||d3==d1)
		cout<<"Isosceles";
		else
		cout<<"Scalene";
		if(S==2)
		{
			if(d1+d2==d3 || d2+d3==d1 || d1+d3==d2)
			cout<<" right";
			else if(d1>d2+d3 || d2>d1+d3 || d3>d1+d2)
			cout<<" obtuse";
			else
			cout<<" acute";
		}
		cout<<" triangle"<<endl;
	}
		
	
	
}
